titleStmt.title: Here begynneth the boke of knowledge of thynges vnknowen aperteynynge to astronomye with certayne necessarye rules, and certayne speres contaynyng herein compyled by Godfridus super Palladum de agricultura Anglicatum.
This booke of astronomye
titleStmt.author: Godfridus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by me Robert Wyer: dwellynge at the sygne of S. Iohn̄ Euangelyst, in S. Martyns parysshe, besyde Charynge Crosse,

notesStmt.note: Latin original, if any, not traced. An edition of Godfridus This booke of astronomye, ... .
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: The booke of knowledge.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
Identified by ESTC as STC (2nd ed.) 11930.12.

place.placeName: the sygne of S. Iohn̄ Euangelyst, in S. Martyns parysshe, besyde Charynge Crosse
